words.def: County/City (Proper noun)
A wanderer; one who strays in search of variety.
reach a destination
a large natural stream of water (larger than a creek)
a participant in a rave dancing party
A framework upon which laundry is aired; a clotheshorse.
skin.
A type of fur from a squirrel with a black back and white belly, much used on garments in the Middle Ages.
tear or be torn violently
a dance party that lasts all night and electronically synthesized music is played
report or maintain
not widely known
the back of a military formation or procession
A unit of electrical power, in an AC circuit, equal to the power dissipated when 1 volt produces a current of 1 ampere.
compete for something
A main road or highway, especially in ancient Rome. Mainly used in set phrases, below.
An Ave Maria .
rate of revolution of a motor
A submergent coastal landform, often known as a drowned river valley.
a mixture of gases (especially oxygen) required for breathing
a unit of surface area equal to 100 square meters
the sense organ for hearing and equilibrium
a period marked by distinctive character or reckoned from a fixed point or event
to make a mistake or be incorrect
a strong emotion
A member of an ancient indigenous ethnolinguistic group of Nepal.
An old Portuguese money of account .
an agency of the United States Army responsible for providing timely and relevant and accurate and synchronized intelligence to tactical and operational and strategic level commanders
a rare heavy polyvalent metallic element that resembles manganese chemically and is used in some alloys
a trivalent metallic element of the rare earth group
a colorless and odorless inert gas
one.
